chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (f : B -> A) (g : A -> B) (e : env A), (forall x : A, f (g x) = x) -> map f (map g e) = e

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments T
env = fun A : Type => list (option A) : Type -> Type Arguments env _%type_scope
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> env A -> list (option B)
map_map_fuse : forall (A B C : Type) (f : B -> C) (g : A -> B) (h : A -> C) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f (g d) = h d) -> map f (map g e) = map h e
map_insert_map : forall (A : Type) (f g h : A -> A) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), (forall a0 : A, f (g a0) = g (h a0)) -> map f (insert x a (map g e)) = insert x (f a) (map g (map h e))
map_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), map f (insert x a e) = insert x (f a) (map f e)
map_insert_eq : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (a : A) (b : B) (e : env A), f a = b -> map f (insert x a e) = insert x b (map f e)
map_raw_insert : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (x : nat) (e : env A), map f (raw_insert x None e) = raw_insert x None (map f e)
lookup_map_some_reverse : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (b : B) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x (map f e) = Some b -> exists a : A, lookup x e = Some a /\ b = f a
lookup_map_none : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = None -> lookup x (map f e) = None
lookup_map_some : forall (A B : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A) (f : A -> B), lookup x e = Some a -> lookup x (map f e) = Some (f a)
map_map_exchange : forall (A F G B : Type) (f1 : F -> B) (f2 : A -> F) (g1 : G -> B) (g2 : A -> G) (e : env A), (forall d : A, f1 (f2 d) = g1 (g2 d)) -> map f1 (map f2 e) = map g1 (map g2 e)
map_empty : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B), map f (empty A) = empty B
map_nth_error : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), nth_error l n = Some d -> nth_error (List.map f l) n = Some (f d)
lookup_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (e : env A), lookup (S x) e = lookup x (tl e)
raw_insert_successor : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), raw_insert (S x) o e = lookup 0 e :: raw_insert x o (tl e)
lookup_shift_insert : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), lookup (shift y x) (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
fold : forall A B : Type, (option A -> B -> B) -> env A -> B -> B
empty_eq_insert : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (o : A) (e : env A), empty A = insert x o e -> False
lookup_insert_recent : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x < y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup x e
option_map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> option A -> option B
List.map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
insert_nil : forall (A : Type) (x : nat) (a : A) (e : env A), insert x a e = nil -> False
lookup_insert_old : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x > y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = lookup (x - 1) e
RingMicromega.map_option : forall A B : Type, (A -> option B) -> option A -> option B
fold_left : forall A B : Type, (A -> B -> A) -> list B -> A -> A
lookup_insert_bingo : forall (A : Type) (x y : nat) (o : option A) (e : env A), x = y -> lookup x (raw_insert y o e) = o
fst = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (x, _) := p in x : forall A B : Type, A * B -> A Arguments fst {A B}%type_scope
map_lift_map_lift : forall (T : Type) (k s wk ws : nat) (e : env T) (H : Lift T), LiftLift -> k <= s -> map (lift wk k) (map (lift ws s) e) = map (lift ws (wk + s)) (map (lift wk k) e)
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Tauto.GFormula_rect : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Type, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [ |- Type] ?TX : [ |- Type] ?AA : [ |- Type] ?AF : [ |- Type]
Tauto.GFormula_ind : forall P : Tauto.GFormula -> Prop, P Tauto.TT -> P Tauto.FF -> (forall t : ?TX, P (Tauto.X t)) -> (forall (t : ?TA) (a : ?AA), P (Tauto.A t a)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.Cj g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> forall g0 : Tauto.GFormula, P g0 -> P (Tauto.D g g0)) -> (forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g -> P (Tauto.N g)) ->...-> forall g : Tauto.GFormula, P g where ?TA : [ |- Type] ?TX : [ |- Type] ?AA : [ |- Type] ?AF : [ |- Type]

```coq
intros A B f g e H.
induction e as [| x xs IH].
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite H. f_equal. apply IH.
Qed.
